text: The six tripoints of Oklahoma are: * 8 Mile Corner – Oklahoma, Kansas, Colorado * Preston Monument – Oklahoma, Colorado, New Mexico * Texhomex – Oklahoma, New Mexico, Texas * OKTXAR Corner – Oklahoma, Texas, Arkansas * OKARMO Corner – Oklahoma, Arkansas, Missouri * Tri-State Marker – Oklahoma, Kansas, Missouri ==See also== *Tri-state area ==External links== * Tri State Corners in the United States by Jack Parsell (2002) – PDF Book Category:Geography of Oklahoma Category:Border tripoints
title: List of Oklahoma tri-points
